mapper.select: SELECT no_seq as seq, no_user_num as user_num, no_subject as subject, date_format(no_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as wdate, datediff( now(), no_date ) wgap, user_nickname FROM notice_board n INNER JOIN user u ON n.no_user_num = u.user_num ORDER BY no_seq desc LIMIT #{skip}, #{recordPerPage}
SELECT no_seq as seq, no_subject as subject, no_user_num as user_num, no_content as content, date_format(no_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as wdate FROM notice_board WHERE no_seq = #{seq}
SELECT no_seq as seq, no_subject as subject FROM notice_board WHERE no_seq IN ( ( select max(no_seq) from notice_board where no_seq < #{seq} ) )
SELECT no_seq as seq, no_subject as subject FROM notice_board WHERE no_seq IN ( ( select min(no_seq) from notice_board where no_seq > #{seq} ) )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_board ( no_seq, no_user_num, no_subject, no_content, no_date ) VALUES ( 0, #{user_num}, #{subject}, #{content}, now() );
mapper.select: SELECT no_seq, no_user_num, no_subject, no_content, no_date FROM notice_board WHERE no_seq = #{seq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM notice_board WHERE no_seq = #{seq} AND no_user_num = #{user_num}
